verse: Here is a prophecy against Babylon that the Lord gave me. Babylon is known as the Desert by the Sea.
Here is a prophecy against Edom that the Lord gave me.
Here is a prophecy against Arabia that the Lord gave me.
The Lord spoke to me. He said, “In exactly one year, Kedar’s splendor will come to an end.
Only a few of Kedar’s soldiers who shoot arrows will be left alive.” The Lord has spoken. He is the God of Israel.
